Description: Fragment of shoulder of black figure painted pottery neck amphora. Tongues (dark, purple, dark, white). Purple also on the necking ring.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 608,8)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 38)
